item.title: ‘The Souffleur’ Director Gastón Solnicki Readies for ‘Big-Scale Historical Film’ About His Grandfather the Chess Master Miguel Najdorf (EXCLUSIVE)
item.description: Argentine director Gastón Solnicki has finished his Viennese trilogy with Willem Dafoe-starring “The Souffleur.” But he’s already developing a “big-scale historical film” about his own grandfather, Po
